column4: ssh problem : I have 2 routers in my network the first gives out 182.168.178.X and the second gives out 192.168.1.X my laptop and my windows pc are both on wifi connected to the 192.168.1 router and they are both able to connect to my server which is on 192.168.178. however I am not able to connect from my server towards my laptop
I can ping the ip from my windows not from my server
